name: Homewood Suites by Hilton San Jose-Silicon Valley

reviews.text: This Homewood Suites is a great property. This Homewood is located in 5 different buildings. Some are intrerior corridors within 3 story buildings, the others are exterior rooms accessible by stairs and are two levels.
reviews.title: I Love this place!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: General Manager Doyle O'Neil and his staff do an outstanding job at this property. They are welcoming and the property reflects this. I have stayed at this location several times over the last couple years. Each time, I have had a clean spacious room which makes the ability to relax easy. The living room and bedroom each have a TV, not flat screens yet, but i'm sure they will within time. The beds are so comfortable and they place an extra blanket folded into the bed if needed, what a nice touch!
reviews.title: Very comfortable place

likes.liked: — Good food and friendly service, close to airport

reviews.title: Homelyish
reviews.text: The bathroom and shower area is impeccable. They give some nice tolietry items, including mouthwash. Most places have curved shower curtains now a days, as does this place.

Some rooms have fireplaces which is a nice touch for the cool bay area evenings. The kitchen are standard, two burner stove, microwave and a decent size refrigerator. They wash all the dishes prior to arrival so you have to put them away as they are all in the dishwasher, just like at home!
reviews.title: everything you could want

reviews.text: Don't let the exterior of this hotel fool you! It looks really boring and is in the middle of a business area, but our room was really nice. We had a lounge with a fireplace! a seperate bedroom with a king size bed, 2 TV's, a kitchen and a table to eat at. Breakfast was very nice, lots of choice and very well stocked. Staff were great really helpful and friendly. Right next door to the hotel are many places to eat; pizza, chinese, thai, greek, subway, burgers, indian....plenty of choice! My son was thrilled that the hotel even has an outdoor basketball court and will loan you a basketball!
reviews.title: very nice room

reviews.text: This chain really reminds me of Residence Inn, I think its Hilton's attempt to grab some of that market. They even offer complimentary dinner during the week for business guests. I was very impressed and would stay there again.
reviews.title: Perfect home base for San Francisco, Pebble Beach, and the Wine Country

reviews.text: We just returned from our San Francisco trip. We normally rent a house or condo but we were traveling with our cousin who has cerebral palsy and needed a handicapped room. The hotel was so clean, the staff was so helpful. They serve an awesome hot breakfast everyday and on Monday's thru Thursdays, they have a cocktail hour complete with a small dinner.
reviews.title: We made the right choice!

reviews.text: We were a party of 5. four of us shared a two bedroom (king beds) and two bathroom room. It had a kitchen and 3 TV's. Our cousin had the handicapped room. It worked great, but there were a few things that could have accomodated him a little better. IE... thermostat lower on the wall and curtain pulls a little lower so he could close them without assistance. But other than those two minor items, we had a wonderful stay. This hotel is perfect as a home base. We stayed here the entire time and made day trips to Sonoma, Pebble Beach, San Francisco, etc. So much easier than packing and repacking. They also have a shuttle van that will take you to and from the hotel, plus you can request it for any destination within 5 miles. I would definately stay here again.
reviews.title: I told you we'd be back!!

reviews.text: We had a great family vacation in California and were very happy that we chose to stay at Homewood. We spent a few days at California's Great America and this hotel was the best value and only 2 miles away.
reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!

likes.liked: — The size, cleanliness, and comfort of the rooms.
likes.disliked: — I was not able to stay longer.

aka: Homewood Suites By Hilton San Jose-Silicon Valley Hotel
description: The Homewood Suites by Hilton San Jose Airport is an upscale, all-suite hotel located less than two miles from the SJC Airport and only four miles from downtown San Jose. Our upscale suites are the perfect base for you while in the San Jose area for business, pleasure, relocation, or on an extended assignment that requires residential apartment like accommodations to make yourself at home.
